body.name: Blueendless Ultra Slim Portable External Hard Drive USB3.0 2.5" HDD Storage Compatible for PC, Desktop, Laptop (500GB)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 17 mins
features: Plug and Play - Without software to install, just plug it in and go.
Equipped with USB 3.0 connection, this portable hard drive enables you to backup massive data in seconds, delivering ultra fast transfer speed to improve your PC performance
Support system：98SE,Windows 2000, Linux, Vista, WIN7,WIN8,win10,compatible MAC
Provides ample storage space for your music, movies and other files.
Package includes:1 x Portable Hard Drive,1 x USB3.0 Cable, 1 x User Manual, 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty.

About Capacity: Hard disk vendors are using decimal arithmetic: 1MB = 1000KB, 1G = 1000MB calculated But the operating system is using binary arithmetic: 1MB = 1024KB, 1GB = 1024MB. So there are some differences between display capacity and nominal capacity of hard disk products, However, this is allowed to exist. Please do not doubt his authenticity. About capacity:160GB=148GB 250GB=232GB 320GB=298GB 500GB=465GB

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 84 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Slim and Metal Design Merely 0.51 inch thick,plastic material, strong compression and drop resistance, more efficient heat dissipation. Easy to carry, you can adapt to any environment wherever you are. Low consumption, ultra-fast transmission, beautiful appearance. Black is a timeless color and you deserve it. Portable expansion storage powered by USB 3.0, compatible with USB 2.0. Powered by USB 3.0 technology, Blueendless portable hard drives are much faster than USB 2.0, allowing fast transfer when organizing your files. This device has been formatted in EXFAT and does not need to install any software, plug and play, so it is easy to store files. Simply connect the USB cable to your computer and you are ready to start sending files. This default portable hard drive is formatted to exFAT, which works well with Windows and Mac. Some of the older devices may need to reformat. No reformatation required for Windows and Mac, just plug it in and play. To maximize performance, please connect your hard drive to a USB 3.0 port, also compatible with USB 2.0.

Improve PC performance Offering a high storage capacity of up to 2tb, this drive is made to free up more space and efficiently improve the performance of your PC and laptop. Easy to use The Blueendless Ultra Slim external hard drive is ready for use without external power supply or software installation required. Simply drag and drop the files you want to save. Ultra Compact and lightweight This product you can take with you wherever you go, is very portable, can back up your files anytime, anywhere, choose Blueendless, you deserve it.

About the capacity Actual usable storage capacity may be less Hard disk vendors use decimal arithmetic: 1MB = 1000KB, 1G = 1000MB calculated but the operating system USES binary arithmetic: 1MB = 1024KB, 1GB = 1024MB. So there are some differences between the display capacity and the nominal capacity of the hard disk products. However, this is allowed to exist. Do not doubt its authenticity. 160GB=148GB 250GB=232GB 320GB=298GB 500GB=465GB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars small and good value
reviews.reviewText: extra space for not a lot of money. works fine with a mac

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent value for the money and a worthwhile investment.
reviews.reviewText: I am very satisfied with this external hard drive. I bought it just in time as my computer was dying and because of Amazons fast delivery I was able to save at least ninety percent of my data before my computer crashed for the final time and now, I use it to perform weekly backups of my new computer. I would highly suggest it as an accessory to the purchase of any new computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fast and practical
reviews.reviewText: I bought it mostly to put some movies and shows that I have in a flash drive that is full and figured I can plug it in the back of the TV but the cord is too small it would be hanging from the USB in n my TV, so now I use it to make room in my Sandisk Flash drives and keep the rest of movies, shows and even pictures there.Other than the short cord is an good product at the right price, I’m not a techie or computer savvy person but for my use is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't beat the price
reviews.reviewText: I have one of these for all my current projects I like them a lot no problems

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t ask for anything better, functions well and can be used as a reliable external without fear of glitching or overheating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke after two weeks, and tech support is non-existent
reviews.reviewText: Worked great for about two weeks. Now it's not recognized by any of my devices.Follow up. I was able to get a replacement sent and connected the new cable to the old device, and it worked for another two weeks. After that, I ordered a new cable, and it worked for a couple of months, but this is clearly shoddy equipment, so don't waste your time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's great for the price and storage size. Only thing was it was all in foreign language and couldn't change it over. Other then that it's good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Good device, very easy to set up
Very easy to connect and drag and drop files and pictures. Very satisfied.
